text.div: • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 410521004 (Not to be done (qualifier value))

name: QICoreCommunicationReasonNotPerformed
title: Communication reason not performed codes
description: Reason communication was not performed. A set of codes specifying the motivation, cause, or rationale of not performing a communication such as being rejected or refused. This value set is provided as a suggestive example.
